Question: Reelcause R&D CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Reelcause R&D

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Eco-friendly new and renewable energy technology
- Produces green hydrogen energy using water electrolysis and small wind power generation
- Aims to enter the global market with hydrogen vehicle charging business and zero-energy building
- Complementary and sustainable business structure focusing on reducing greenhouse gases
- R&D divisions in Russia and the US for global competitiveness
- Focus on building a green hydrogen ecosystem and reinforcing global market leadership
- Emphasis on protecting the global environment through eco-friendly expertise of green hydrogen
